Package org.redlich.security

package org.redlich.security
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApplicationIdentityStore
    An implementation of the IdentityStore interface to add user `Mike` and define the roles.
    CustomAuthenticationMechanismHandler
    This HttpAuthenticationMechanismHandler overrides the default provided one and delegates requests to two individual authentication mechanisms depending on the request path.
    ProtectedServlet1
    Test Servlet that prints out the name of the authenticated caller and whether this caller is in any of the roles {foo, bar, kaz}
    ProtectedServlet2
    Test Servlet that prints out the name of the authenticated caller and whether this caller is in any of the roles {foo, bar, kaz}
    SecurityApplication
    Define a container authentication mechanism that implements the HTTP basic access authentication protocol as defined by the Servlet spec (13.6.1) and make that implementation available as an enabled CDI bean.
    SecurityService
    SecurityService class.
    SingleSecurityServlet
    Test Servlet that prints out the name of the authenticated caller and whether this caller is in any of the roles {admin, audit, user}
    TestAuthenticationMechanism1
    TestAuthenticationMechanism1 class.
    TestAuthenticationMechanism2
    TestAuthenticationMechanism2 class.
    TestIdentityStore
    TestIdentityStore class.
